org.pragmaticminds.crunch.execution

Interface MergeFunction<T extends Serializable,R extends Serializable>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UntypedValuesMergeFunction
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface MergeFunction<T extends Serializable,R extends Serializable>
extends Serializable
    Interface for implementation of merge functions for pipelines
    Author:
    Erwin Wagasow Created by Erwin Wagasow on 02.10.2018

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R merge(T value)
      Merges incomming values to a aggregated value containing all other sub values from before.

    • Method Detail

      • merge

        R merge(T value)
        Merges incomming values to a aggregated value containing all other sub values from before.
        Parameters:
        value - to be merged
        Returns:
        merged value
